item.title: Chaire of Design Jean Prouvé
item.description: ⌈Inaugural lecture⌋  ⌈Recent writings⌋ La diversité dans l’enseignement du design et des métiers d’art doit faire école ⌈Courses⌋ Design Master Cnam·CESAAP in residence at the Academia of climate in Paris ⌈Teaching⌋ Design research (DSN201) · Reflective practices (DSN202) · Digital skills for professional transition (TET007) ⌈Events⌋ Research seminar Mediums in design with Annie Gentès, CY École de design ⌈Projects⌋ Scuola del non sapere with Ruedi Baur and Civic City · TransFabriC at CNAM ⌈Pierre Lévy⌋ prof.dr.ing. Pierre Lévy, HDR · Professor (PRCM) at National Conservatory of Arts and Crafts, France · Holder of the Chair of design Jean Prouvé · Member of the Dicen-IDF lab (EA 7339) ⌈Researching⌋ My main focus is the creation of a Japanese philosophy-inspired design framework to think further the relation between design and appropriation, contributing to Transforming Practices.
